# AdSpirit

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="adspirit"
  data-asm-params="&amp;pid=4"
  data-asm-host="help.adspirit.de"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please see [AdSpirit's documentation](http://help.adspirit.de/help/).

Supported parameters:

-   `data-asm-params`
-   `data-asm-host`
